"Bergmann": "...What an ethereal place. Equal parts beautiful and terrifying..."
"Was out here once on a DOLLS raid with a bunch of others, when somehow I got separated from them."
"That was one hell of a rough time, let me tell you..."
"Hah, listen to me getting all nostalgic about something like that!"
"Really though, I appreciate you entertaining all these silly requests from some old dog like me."
"I'll make it up to you one day, you hear me?"
